email.title: Origin is hiring!
email.text:
![Poster](https://i.imgur.com/OfzKMF6.png)
Origin is a leader in the growing capital markets technology space, now supporting over 100 major investment banks and borrowers across our products. We are looking for smart and driven Imperial computer science graduates to join our team as we rapidly grow our product offering in the following roles:
**Graduate Product Manager Summer 2021** - You'll be responsible for figuring out what/why/how we develop the Origin platform to best satisfy our customers. You'll be constantly problem-solving and sit at the intersection of our clients, the business team, the developers, designers. This is an incredibly challenging and fast-paced role.
**Graduate Software Engineer Immediate Start or Summer 2021** - You will be peer mentored, trained and expected to rapidly develop your skillset. You will gain exposure to both the backend and frontend and over time you'll choose which one to specialize in. We have a strong focus on testing & code quality, as well as continuous learning and have a proven track-record in scaling juniors/mids very rapidly.
Please apply below: https://www.originmarkets.com/careers
![Hiring gif](https://i.imgur.com/gGPMenZ.gif)
